sub_title: Simultaneous Interpreter German-English-Chinese | Marketing Translation | Game localization | Cultural Consultant
summary:
For over a decade, I have been supporting premium brands to unlock the Chinese market, translating from English and German to Chinese.

Born and raised in Shanghai, I grew up with a passion for language and culture. It is that passion that led me to my master degree in Simultaneous Interpretation, and later on my translator career. I lived in Austria, Singapore and now finally settled down in the Netherlands.

In 2014 I put together a team of trusted translators and founded our boutique translation agency – Wordific. At Wordific, all your projects will go through my hands. I will be your contact person, project manager – and sometimes translator or interpreter.

Book an introductory online meeting with me and tell me all about your projects and goals. I will help you find and implement the right tone of voice to connect with a much broader audience.
